issue.title: Fix user account deletion not working

labels.name: lgtm/need 1
labels.description: This PR needs approval from one additional maintainer to be merged.

labels.name: pr/wip
labels.description: This PR is not ready for review

repository.name: gitea
repository.description: Git with a cup of tea! Painless self-hosted all-in-one software development service, including Git hosting, code review, team collaboration, package registry and CI/CD

body:
> Its a simple check error `UserSignIn: user's password is invalid`

Yes, this password error should be displayed in the UI but not return 500
Caused by #25414 and we now need to check all possible errors come from https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/services/auth/source/db/authenticate.go#L46

issue.title: Fix internal server error when deleting user with wrong password

labels.name: lgtm/need 2
labels.description: This PR needs two approvals by maintainers to be considered for merging.

repository.name: gitea
repository.description: Git with a cup of tea! Painless self-hosted all-in-one software development service, including Git hosting, code review, team collaboration, package registry and CI/CD

issue.body:
Reproduce procedure of this bug: 
In web page `settings/account`, enter the wrong password and click `delete` to delete current user. 
Before:
![ksnip_20230918-111950](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/assets/70063547/f46524dd-f081-4d19-9850-a9d325bae655)
After:
![ksnip_20230918-133241](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/assets/70063547/2c83f773-8966-4655-9805-915855dbdf4d)

I deleted the function `IsErrUserNotExist` because I don't think `auth.UserSignIn` will return that error. However, if there are conditions that I might missed, please correct me.

body: Also consider the case that the user doesn't have a password, as in oauth2 users via github etc
